    • Constructor Detail

      • Corpse

        public Corpse(processing.core.PApplet p,
              processing.core.PVector position,
              processing.core.PVector size,
              float angle,
              processing.core.PVector velocity,
              java.awt.Color currentTintColor,
              float angularVelocity,
              int betweenFrames,
              int maxLife,
              java.lang.String effectType,
              java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String bloodParticle,
              int frame,
              boolean animated)
        A dead enemy.
        Parameters:
        p - the PApplet
        position - position of the corpse
        size - size of the corpse
        angle - rotation of the corpse
        velocity - movement of the corpse
        currentTintColor - initial tint color
        angularVelocity - rotational speed of the corpse
        betweenFrames - number of times to duplicate a frame
        maxLife - how long it should last
        effectType - what sort of visual effect to apply
        name - what enemy this was
        bloodParticle - what color the blood should be
        frame - what frame to start its animation on
        animated - should it be animated
